subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Lane Kiffin, the youngest head coach in the N.F.L.’s modern era, is just young enough, and bold enough, to proceed undaunted as the Raiders’ new head coach.
snippet: Lane Kiffin, the youngest head coach in the N.F.L.’s modern era, is just young enough, and bold enough, to proceed undaunted as the Raiders’ new head coach.
